<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"列出部署"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/projects/{project_id}/list_deployments"} context={"endpoint"} />

列出项目的所有部署。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"project_id","in":"path","description":"项目 ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"请求体"} body={undefined} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["name","createTime","deploymentType","projectId"],"properties":{"createTime":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"此部署创建时的时间戳（毫秒）。"},"deploymentType":{"description":"指示该部署是 \"dev\" 开发环境部署还是 \"prod\" 生产部署。","type":"string","enum":["dev","prod","preview"],"title":"DeploymentType"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"此部署的可读标识符，例如\nplayful-otter-123。"},"previewIdentifier":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"description":"预览部署的标识符（如果这是一个预览部署）。","type":"string","title":"PreviewDeploymentIdentifier"}]},"projectId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId","description":"此部署所属的项目。"}},"title":"PlatformDeploymentResponse"}}}}}}} />
